titleStmt.title: Certaine verie worthie, godly and profitable sermons, vpon the fifth chapiter of the Songs of Solomon: preached by Bartimeus Andreas, minister of the word of God; published at the earnest and long request of sundrie well minded Christians
titleStmt.author: Andrewes, Bartimaeus.

titleStmt.title: Certaine verie worthie, godly and profitable sermons, vpon the fifth chapiter of the Songs of Solomon: preached by Bartimeus Andreas, minister of the word of God; published at the earnest and long request of sundrie well minded Christians
titleStmt.author: Andrewes, Bartimaeus.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Waldegraue, for Thomas man [sic],

notesStmt.note: Imperfect; in the Union Theological Seminary, New York City, copy, pages 225-end there is print show through; as filmed, British Library copy lacks all between the title page and page 224.
Reproductions of the originals in the Union Theological Seminary, New York City, and the British Library.
